subdivision_of_building: The eastern elevation of the Cabinet Building
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be removed within 18 months of the date of this consent.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part 2 - Development Management Policies (January 2020) and the London Plan (2021).

The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers: P_2200 Rev 00 (Site Location Plan) dated 21/02/2024, P_2200 Rev 00 (Banner Location)dated 21/02/2024 and P_2000 Rev 01 (Proposed elevation)dated 21/02/2024; and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part 2 - Development Management Policies (January 2020) and the London Plan (2016).
The building wrap approved shall be constructed of breathable PVC mesh and an aluminium tubular framework and shall thereafter be retained as such.

To safeguard the visual amenities of the area and to ensure that the proposed development does not have an adverse effect upon the appearance of the existing building in accordance with Policy DMHB 11 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020)
The public art/signage hereby permitted shall not be illuminated.

In order to protect the visual amenity of the area and/or highway safety in accordance with Policies DMT 1 and DMT 2 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part 2 - Development Management Policies (January 2020) and the London Plan (2016).
description: Installation of building wrap in the form of public art for a temporary period of 18 months on the eastern elevation of the Cabinet Building
